author: sproul
content: noob question: how can I get `kurtosis run` to update the ethereum-package version? I had assumed it was being updated, but it seems it wasn't (until I put an explicit commit hash)

content: Is it not? I always run `kurtosis run github.com/ethpandaops/ethereum-package --args-file config.yaml` and looks like it pulls from github every time so I assume it's always up to date
